a.title: OGSD Offices Closed in Observance of Memorial Day Holiday

div.div: OGSD Offices Closed in Observance of Memorial Day Holiday

a.title: Riverside Preparatory High School 2020 Commencement Ceremony

div.div: Riverside Preparatory High School 2020 Commencement Ceremony

div.style: font-family: georgia, serif; color: rgb(53, 28, 117); text-align: center;

p.style: color: rgb(53, 28, 117); margin: 0in 0in 0.0001pt; font-size: 11pt; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif;

span.strong: To ensure the health and safety of our staff, the District Office is closed and we are currently working off-site.

p.style: color: rgb(53, 28, 117); margin: 0in 0in 0.0001pt; font-size: 11pt; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif;

span.span:
For the latest District information, click here on Coronavirus Updates.
Click here to access our Distance Learning Program.
If you have any enrollment questions, please send an email to enrollment@riversideprep.net.

p.style: color: rgb(53, 28, 117); margin: 0in 0in 0.0001pt; font-size: 11pt; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif;

span.span: For any other questions, please send an email to rchavez@orogrande.org and your email will be routed to the appropriate person who will then get back to you

p.style: color: rgb(53, 28, 117); margin: 0in 0in 0.0001pt; font-size: 11pt; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif;
p.span: We thank you for your understanding and hope you have a great day!

p.style: color: rgb(53, 28, 117); margin: 0in 0in 0.0001pt; font-size: 11pt; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif;

span.strong: Para garantizar la salud y la seguridad de nuestro personal, actualmente estamos trabajando fuera de las oficinas.

p.style: color: rgb(53, 28, 117); margin: 0in 0in 0.0001pt; font-size: 11pt; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif;

span.span: Si tiene alguna pregunta sobre el registro de estudiantes, envíe un correo electrónico a enrollment@riversideprep.net.

p.style: color: rgb(53, 28, 117); margin: 0in 0in 0.0001pt; font-size: 11pt; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif;

span.span: Para cualquier otra pregunta, envíe un correo electrónico a rchavez@orogrande.org y su correo electrónico se enviará a la persona adecuada que luego se comunicará con usted

p.style: color: rgb(53, 28, 117); margin: 0in 0in 0.0001pt; font-size: 11pt; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif;
p.span: Le agradecemos su comprensión y esperamos que todos estén bien.

p.style: color: rgb(53, 28, 117); margin: 0in 0in 0.0001pt; font-size: 11pt; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif;

span.style: font-size: medium; text-align: center; font-family: pt-sans, sans-serif; color: rgb(149, 55, 52);
